name: COGITO Natalia Kobza
goal: COGITO focuses on work with new technologies and startegy in particulary in the area of smart cities, Internet of Things and space sector. It is active on the Polish market, however, it posses an expertise in CEE countries, as well as Germany.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Budget, Communication, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Information Society, Internal Market, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
COGITO is active in the following EU initiatives: regional development, circular economy, common European market, space sector and digitalization.
Specific policies that are followed by COGITO are:
Implementation of the Circular Economy Action Plan
European Innovation Partnership (EIP) on Smart Cities and Communities
Urban Innovative Actions
customers: The Keryx Group,Paszport do eksportu,Mera Systemy
